solution_line_template: When Haman collected {collected_trays} trays and dropped {dropped_trays} trays, he was left with {collected_trays} trays - {dropped_trays} trays = <<{collected_trays}-{dropped_trays}={remaining_trays_after_drop}>>{remaining_trays_after_drop} trays.

When he added {added_trays} more trays, the total number of trays became {remaining_trays_after_drop} trays + {added_trays} trays = <<{remaining_trays_after_drop}+{added_trays}={total_trays}>>{total_trays} trays.
Since each tray contains {eggs_per_tray} eggs, the total number of eggs to be sold is {eggs_per_tray} eggs/tray * {total_trays} trays = {total_eggs_sold} eggs.
